fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check someone's D&D alignment at night.
- Smite someone during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All roles are secretly assigned a D&D alignment by the host. (Lawful/Neutral/Chaotic) + (Good/Neutral/Evil)
- You are immune to frames and disguises.
- You may only smite once per day.
- You cannot be killed by Travellers.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all players of three D&D alignments at random. You know which three you have to kill.
